data.text: Ukumbuke kutsakuwa na maghayo mne ghamatsuwa gha utsighilo.

Iwanu watsenoghela iwenyegho na watsonoghela tsisendi na watsetunya na watsakuwa na chidandali na watsokuwa na maligho, watsoleka kuwahulikitsa aba tsawo na mai tsawo, watsokuwa wahela mighede, watsokuwa ng'awahenzeluke bae,
iwalihela unoghelo na iwolema kwighongola na waghutsu na ing'awodaha kwilongotsa na wakali, ing'awonoghela ghanoghile,
iwohunduka weyawo na iwotenda bila kwipfikitsa na wane chepfu na iweghoda na iwenogheletsa iwenyegho kubita kumnogheletsa Imulungu.
Kwa kunze wakoneka ka iwanu iwompfuka Imulungu, lekeni woilema ngupfu yake. Wibaghule ghendo ne iwanu awo.
Wamwenga wawo woghenda mne tsing'anda tse iwanu aku wowabugha iwapinga wabotsi ili wawahulikitse, wapinga iwali ne imitsigho ye nzambi na iwaghoghighwe na soyoka nyingi,
ghamatsuwa ghose welangulitsa lekeni ng'awodaha bae kuumanya ukweli.
Iwanu awo wolema ukweli ka Yane na Yamble
Lekeni ng'awatsodaha kughendelela ng'ani kwaapfila ubotsi wawo utsakoneka ghendo kwe iwanu wose, ka pfailawile kwa Yane na Yamble
Lekeni ghweghwe kughawinza ghamalangulitso ghangu na pfanikalagha na chanibamile mne ughima wangu na inoghola yangu na ukududumila kwangu na unoghelo wangu na ukubetetsa kwangu,
madununziko na maghayo. Koghamanya ighanilawile ako Antiyokiya, Ikoniya na Lisitira. Tsanidudumila madununziko makulu ng'ani, naye Imtwatsa kang'ombola mna agho ghose.
Chila imunu iyobama kukala kwa kumpfuka Imulungu na kwa kumuwinza Kiristu Yesu, katsodununzighwa,
lekeni iwanu wehile na waghutsu, watsoghendelela kwiha ghendo, wobugha aku wenyegho wobughighwa.
Lekeni ghweghwe ughendelele na achila chawilangulitse na kuchitoghola ghendo, kwaapfila kowamanya awala iwakulangulitse,
naghwe kulawa udodo wako tsakughamanya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, ighodaha kukwing'a inzewele ili ukombolighwe kwa kumtoghola Kiristu Yesu.
Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghose Imulungu kaghahumulila Muhe wake, na ghanogha kulangulitsila ukweli na ukukanya na kulangusa matotso na kuwalongotsa iwanu wakale pfinoghile,
ili imunu we Imulungu atimilike, na adahe kutenda ghose ghanoghile.
